channel.title: LA on Police Overhead
channel.description: Recent content in LA on Police Overhead

item.title: LA County Sheriff - November 2020
item.description: In November 2020, LA County Sheriff flew 17 aircraft for a total of 590 hours. There were 440 flights. The longest was 5.19 hours

item.title: LA County Sheriff - October 2020
item.description: In October 2020, LA County Sheriff flew 19 aircraft for a total of 588 hours. There were 433 flights. The longest was 4.05 hours

item.title: LAPD - November 2020
item.description: In November 2020, LAPD flew 17 aircraft for a total of 988 hours. There were 541 flights. The longest was 4.63 hours

item.title: LAPD - October 2020
item.description: In October 2020, LAPD flew 16 aircraft for a total of 1162 hours. There were 600 flights. The longest was 5.21 hours
